title: いなくなれ、群青 (go away, ultramarine)
description: “Stairway Island," a small island with a population of 2,000, home to the “forsaken." Nanakusa lives peacefully in the midst of the stagnant stability. But after reuniting with Manabe Yuu, a girl who is always genuine and honest regardless of time or place, will his daily life change drastically…?
author: 河野 裕
